channel.title: C on Liuyu の blog
channel.description: Recent content in C on Liuyu の blog

item.title: argc
item.description:
C中的argc和argv #include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #include <basetsd.h> int main(int argc, char * argv[]) { std::cout << "Hello, World!" << std::endl; for (int i = 0; i < argc; ++i) { printf("%d:%s
", i, argv[i]); } printf("parse hex:
"); UINT32 hex; sscanf(argv[1], "0x%x", &hex); printf("0x%x
", hex); printf("parse double:
"); double f0; sscanf(argv[2], "%lf", &f0); printf("%lf
", f0); return 0; }

item.title: printf
item.description: C语言中的printf 我们常常使用C中标准库自带的printf打印内容 例如： #include <stdio.h> int main(){ printf("hello,world\n"); return 0; } C语言中的printf打印十六进制 #include <stdio.h> int main(){ printf("0x%x | 0x%X
